features.name: User Authentication System
features.description: Complete JWT-based authentication with login, logout, and role-based access control (admin, auditor, user roles)

features.name: Role-Based Permission System
features.description: Comprehensive permission system controlling access to different features based on user roles with fine-grained permissions

features.name: Admin User Management
features.description: Admin panel for creating, editing, and managing users with role assignment and linking to owners/investors

features.name: Dashboard and Navigation
features.description: Main dashboard showing deals overview with navigation bar and role-based menu options

features.name: Deals Management System
features.description: Core functionality for creating, viewing, editing, and managing land deals with status tracking

features.name: Owners Management
features.description: System for managing property owners with contact details, documents, and star rating feature

features.name: Investors Management
features.description: Complete investor management system with investment tracking, star rating, and deal associations

features.name: Payments System with Installments
features.description: Advanced payment management system supporting installments, multiple payment types, and financial tracking

features.name: Financial Reporting and Analytics
features.description: Profit/loss analysis, payment ledgers, and financial reports with charts and export capabilities

features.name: Document Management
features.description: File upload and management system for payment proofs, contracts, and legal documents

features.name: Star Rating System
features.description: Gmail-style star system for marking important owners and investors for quick access

features.name: Database Schema and Migrations
features.description: Complete MySQL database schema with migration system for owners, investors, deals, payments, and users

features.name: API Integration Layer
features.description: Axios-based API client with authentication interceptors, error handling, and caching

features.name: UI Components and Styling
features.description: Reusable UI components with Tailwind CSS styling including modals, forms, and navigation

features.name: Data Export and PDF Generation
features.description: Export functionality for payments, reports, and financial data with PDF generation capabilities
